Time left to register: Time left to register to the electoral list:
The freedom to move and live anywhere: If you've been living here for more than three months, you can vote in the municipal elections (March 2020). A real european metropolis should also have elected representatives working for the needs and interests of the European population. Register on the electoral list before February 7th to make this happen.
To vote in the municipal elections, you: To vote in the municipal elections, you need to add your name to your local electoral list. You have the right to do so, if:
be at least 18 years of age: you are at least 18 years old
live in France: live in France since at least three months
Identification - Passport, Identity Card: Identification - Passport, Identity Card or residence permit
It is possible to do the registration: It is possible to do the registration
Adressed by mail: addressed by mail to the Elections Department
In district town halls: in district town halls or in the 'Elections' department of the Town Hall
Create a reminder (ics file) by using th: Create a reminder (ics file) by using the form below.
